entry.title: its-ryyt/Philippines---Javascript-Address-Selector: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.

entry.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
entry.content: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

entry.title: magic-spells/bottom-sheet: A lightweight, customizable Web Component for creating accessible bottom sheets. Perfect for mobile-friendly modals, menus, or interactive panels that slide in from the bottom of the screen.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: nykocz/Brow: A lightweight, distraction-free web browser built with Electron.js. Designed for speed and simplicity, it provides essential browsing features without unnecessary extras. Ideal for users who want a clean and efficient way to explore the web. Fast, intuitive, and easy to use.
entry.content: A lightweight, distraction-free web browser built with Electron.js. Designed for speed and simplicity, it provides essential browsing features without unnecessary extras. Ideal for users who want a clean and efficient way to explore the web. Fast, intuitive, and easy to use.

entry.title: michelle-burton/react-tester: A lightweight React + Vite application for learning and practicing modern front-end testing techniques using Vitest and React Testing Library. Includes simple UI components, behavior-driven unit tests, and examples of mocking and data-driven testing (DDT).
